title: How can Jason hear Brent play trombone in the band

content.question: Jason is attending a parade that features the local high school band. Jason’s friend Brent plays the trombone in the band. It is difficult for Jason to hear Brent play at the parade. Which of the following would best allow Jason to hear Brent’s trombone?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
